name: Vanilla and Chocolate Delight
author: Honda
summary: This makes a delicious dessert that is layers of pecans, cream cheese, and vanilla and chocolate pudding.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed, divided
1 (3.9 ounce) package instant chocolate pudding mix
1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
2 (1.45 ounce) bars milk chocolate with crispy rice, crumbled
directions: Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
In a medium mixing bowl, combine pecans, flour, and butter
In a large bowl, beat together cream cheese and confectioners' sugar until smooth
Fold in half of the whipped topping
Spread on top of cooled crust
In a large bowl, combine milk, chocolate pudding mix, and vanilla pudding mix
Top with remaining whipped topping, and sprinkle with crushed chocolate bars
